dublin_core.dcvalue: To improve anti doping efforts in sports the World Anti Doping Agency WADA introduced the World Anti Doping Program in which among others regulations for providing athletes whereabouts are described Because the effectiveness and efficiency of this system depends on the co operation and compliance of athletes the perspective of elite athletes is important This paper answers the following research questions What is the perspective of Dutch elite athletes on the current whereabouts system in general and how important is their privacy in providing whereabouts in particular In addition this study explores how far the whereabouts system can be developed in the future Are athletes willing to accept greater invasions of their privacy in order to reduce administrative effort and whereabouts failures
The International journal on drug policy
Doping control, providing whereabouts and the importance of privacy for elite athletes.
